application.doc: Retrieving all statistics components and details

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving all statistics components and details
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the Reverse Proxy statistics resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: listAllStatsComponentsJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: status
param.doc: The current statistics status for this component. Can be either on or off.

param.name: file_size
param.doc: The current accumulated size of the statistics log file and all rollover files for this component in bytes.

param.name: interval
param.doc: The time interval between reports of information in the format hours:minutes:seconds.

param.name: count
param.doc: The number of entries that is sent to the log file.

param.name: flush_interval
param.doc: The number of seconds between the flushing of cached records to the log file. This property exists only if the status is on.

param.name: rollover size
param.doc: The maximum file size (in bytes) before the file is rolled-over. This property exists only if the status is on.

param.name: max_rollover_files
param.doc: The maximum number of rollover files to be kept on disk. This parameter is optional. If not specified, all rollover files will be kept.

param.name: compress
param.doc: Whether the rollover files should be compressed. This parameter is optional. If not specified the rollover files will not be compressed.
